name: Love Recipe DEMO
description:
Hi. My name is Double H, and this is my first project finished for My First Game Jam 2018, Winter Edition. It is a romance visual novel with anime influences, where you take the role of a young lady looking for a school club. Will the cooking club hold everything she's ever needed? Only time will tell.

The piece I'm presenting is a demo, a larger story was planned, but no time was found to finish it. While I felt confident about the complete project, after the jam is over I have no plans in the immediate future to finish this game. Of course, if people are interested and conditions are favorable, it should not be a great hassle to do so.

I want to thank my team for the amazing job they've done for me and all the people I met this year at the jam. You'll find your name in the credits' special thanks.

Here's our contact addresses:

http://a-doubleh-x.tumblr.com/

detectiu.alex@gmail.com

http://speedydumpling.tumblr.com

http://aeryel.tumblr.com/
